projects.title: Bindicator
projects.bodyText:
- Script that navigates to a council website, enters the required information and then stores the bin collection dates in variables. 
 - Those variables are then saved as a .json and sent to slack via a POST method using a webhook. 
 - The process of receiving messages periodically was automated by creating a cron job.

projects.title: Nginx Streaming
projects.bodyText: - Simple web app for TV/STB that utilises an open source player to load in a manifest stream.

projects.title: Manga Bot
projects.bodyText: - Script to convert online manga to PDF and send it to me on Slack

projects.title: Puppeteer - Friends Easter Eggs
projects.bodyText:
- The main purpose of this project was to gain a basic understanding of puppeteer. 
 - Navigate to each member of the cast of Friends(1994) on Google and then display the easter eggs related to each one of them.

projects.title: NBA Web Scraper
projects.bodyText:
- Web scraping is the process of extracting and restructuring data from a website, usually to allow for some kind of eventual analysis. 
 - Aim of this project is to scrape NBA game data which can then further be used for various other projects.

projects.title: Predictive Modelling for NBA Seeds
projects.bodyText:
- This research was conducted in partial fulfilment for the degree of Master of Computer Science. 
 - I sought to analyse the widely available National Basketball Association (NBA) statistics and attempt to predict the final seeds of each team at the end of the regular season.

projects.title: Inbound
projects.bodyText:
- Local basketball matches in Bangalore are only followed by those who are aware of the timings as well as the locations of these matches. 
 - This results in enthusiasts missing out on opportunities to watch local matches. The purpose of the system is to create an android application that will help network all members of the basketball community in Bangalore.
